text: Aitor Hernández Gutiérrez (born 24 January 1982 in Ermua, Basque Country) is a Spanish racing cyclist who is currently not under contract to any team. ==Major results== ;1998 :National U17 Cyclo-Cross Championship – 3rd ;2002 :National U23 Cyclo-Cross Championship – 3rd (2002) ;2006 – Euskaltel-Euskadi :20px Combative Rider for Stage 20, Tour de France ;2007 – Euskaltel-Euskadi :Mountains Classification, Vuelta al País Vasco ;2009 *25px Mountain Classification wearer for Stage 5 ==External links== * Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:People from Ermua Category:Basque cyclists Category:Spanish male cyclists Category:Vuelta a España cyclists Category:Tour de France cyclists Category:Giro d'Italia cyclists
title: Aitor Hernández
